name: Hands vs Virus
description: you control two dirty red hands wich are starting near their home. You should take with each hand a soap to make it from dirty-clean and then only you are safe to take-eat the fruit ( one fruit for every hand). If you eat with dirty hand a fruit you get the virus and you loose ! Also you can pass  a hand through the virus enemy without geting the virus,only if the hand has taken a mask before. To win a level you should move the hands again back to the home but with each hand taken 1 fruit and 1 mask.
